FileMonitoringCacheEventListener - Class in ehcachefilemonitor
A cache listener which monitors files for changes as long as they are in the cache.

MonitoredFileListener - Interface in ehcachefilemonitor
 

N

notifyElementEvicted(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files which have been evicted from the cache.
notifyElementExpired(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files which have expired from the cache, as they will no longer be retrievable.
notifyElementPut(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Starts monitoring changes for files added to the cache.
notifyElementRemoved(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files removed from the cache.
notifyElementUpdated(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
No-op.
notifyRemoveAll(Ehcache) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for all files when the cache is emptied.
notifyStartMonitoring(File) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
 
notifyStopMonitoring(File) - Method in class ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
